enhanced_description: Centre for Excellence in Organization (CEO) is an HR and Organizational Development (OD) consulting firm established in December 1999 in Chennai, Tamilnadu. The firm was founded on the belief in the immense human potential latent in every individual, aiming to transform ordinary organizations into high-performing entities. CEO employs a unique 'Partnering in Progress' consulting model, characterized by a handholding approach, to support the entrepreneurial growth of clients, employees, and stakeholders. Their core services focus on driving behavioral change, helping individuals find meaning and direction in their work, and placing leadership at the center of management approaches. They leverage innovative tools and services to assist organizations in becoming bigger, better, and stronger.
